title: COVID-19 vaccines
description: Everyone in Aotearoa New Zealand aged 5 and over can get a free COVID-19 vaccine now.
cleaned_text: COVID-19 vaccines COVID-19 vaccines are free for everyone aged 5 and over. They're also available to tamariki from 6 months who are at greater risk of severe illness if they were to get COVID-19. You might be interested in [ ](/covid-19-vaccines/get-your-covid-19-vaccination/) Get your COVID-19 vaccination Everyone in Aotearoa New Zealand aged 5 and over can get a free COVID-19 vaccine now. You can get a booster if you are aged 16 or over. [ ](/covid-19-vaccines/covid-19-vaccine-boosters/) COVID-19 vaccine boosters Boosters provide an extra layer of protection to your previous vaccination and keep your immunity levels high. Booster doses use the Pfizer BA.4/5 bivalent vaccine.
